feed.title: Brackets Extensions Weekly
feed.subtitle: New and updated stuff to improve your Brackets experience

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/41
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/41.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 09/27/2015 to 10/04/2015.

Last week there were 6 new Extensions and 10 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

The Brackets team prepares for the upcoming 1.5 release. The release will be ready soon. So stay tuned.

If you are interested in supporting the team, feel free to review and comment on existing PR’s. If you found an issue, don’t hesitate to file it and if you already fixed one of the existing issues (you know what you need to do next ;-)).

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter
  • Slack Channel

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Emmet 5126 #2 ⇑
2 Beautify 5104 #1 ⇓
3 Brackets Icons 4019 #4 ⇑
4 QuickDocsJS 2056 ☼
5 HTML Designer for Brackets 1919 #3 ⇓
6 Brackets Synapse 1574 ☼
7 Brackets Git 1543 #5 ⇓
8 Indent Guides 1369 #9 ⇑
9 PHP Syntax Hint 1355 #8 ⇓
10 Bootstrap Skeleton 1254 #6 ⇓
11 Autoprefixer 1197 ⇔

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Stripper 1443 ☼
2 OS X Style - Flat & Dark 1230 #1 ⇓
3 New Moon 867 #2 ⇓
4 EditedTwilight 787 ☼
5 Monokai Dark Soda 703 #4 ⇓
6 Tonight’s Specials 520 #5 ⇓
7 New One Dark 503 #3 ⇓
8 Smooth Neutrals 474 #7 ⇓
9 Chrome Theme 447 #6 ⇓
10 Monokai 436 #9 ⇓
11 Mystique 287 ☼

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
quickJS 0.0.2 Quickly insert JS and jQuery Snippets
Newline 0.0.1 Adds the ability to convert the newline character between CRLF <-> LF
Animations deactivator 1.0.0 Disable animations for better perfomance
Inline calculator 1.0.0 Plugin for performing quick inline calculations with a simple keypress
Violet Dark Theme 1.0.0 A dark theme
Color Highlighter 1.0.0 Color highlighter for CSS, LESS, SASS and Stylus

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Ternific 0.9.1 JavaScript hinting and refactoring powered by Tern
QuickDocsJS 1.6.8 Inline short documentation for JavaScript functions, including a summary,syntax and parameters. Docs for jQuery,NodeJS and some basic ReactJS functions.
Brackets Icons 1.5.5 File icons in Brackets' file tree.
FuncDocr 0.8.30 Generates JSDoc,PHPDoc annotations for your functions.
Command Line Shortcuts 0.2.3 Execute commands with keyboard shortcuts: build, server re-start, fetch the latest sources, etc. Easily customizable.
Stripper 0.1.1 A brackets theme focused on readabiity.
MuCow Language Support 0.4.3 Support for MUSE widget markup (MuCow)
Polymer Code Hinting 0.1.1 Code hinting for the Polymer project
YUIDoc comments inserter 1.0.1 Inserts YUIDoc comment blocks when you select/highlight a function or property. Use Ctr+Alt+Y and a YUIDoc comment block will be inserted with the correct function/property names. Provides the starting framework within which you can then edit things such as description. Works with JS, CoffeeScript and ES6.
Brackets Extension Bundle 1.0.3 JSCompiler, LESS Autocompiler and Monokai Dark Soda theme in one extension.

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/40
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/40.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 09/21/2015 to 09/28/2015.

Last week there were 4 new Extensions and 9 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

The Brackets team prepares for the upcoming 1.5 release. If you have some spare time to provide localization for your language and/or review localization PR’s, this is highly appreciated.

If you are interested in supporting the team, feel free to review and comment on existing PR’s. If you found an issue, don’t hesitate to file it and if you already fixed one of the existing issues (you know what you need to do next ;-)).

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter
  • Slack Channel

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Beautify 5218 ⇔
2 Emmet 4713 #3 ⇑
3 HTML Designer for Brackets 3221 #4 ⇑
4 Brackets Icons 3148 #2 ⇓
5 Brackets Git 1506 #6 ⇑
6 Bootstrap Skeleton 1326 #5 ⇓
7 HTML Templates 1265 ☼
8 PHP Syntax Hint 1228 #9 ⇑
9 Indent Guides 1160 #7 ⇓
10 W3CValidation 1118 ☼
11 Autoprefixer 1107 #8 ⇓

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 OS X Style - Flat & Dark 1986 #11 ⇑
2 New Moon 993 ☼
3 New One Dark 702 #2 ⇓
4 Monokai Dark Soda 682 #5 ⇑
5 Tonight’s Specials 676 #3 ⇓
6 Chrome Theme 577 ☼
7 Smooth Neutrals 535 ☼
8 Neon Morning 464 ☼
9 Monokai 430 ⇔
10 Orchid Theme 412 ☼
11 Apyx easy Dark 379 #1 ⇓

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Chrome Theme 1.0.0 A light gray theme which uses minimal coloring and is easy on the eyes.
YUIDoc comments inserter 1.0.0 Inserts YUIDoc comment blocks when you select/highlight a function or property. Use Ctr+Alt+Y and a YUIDoc comment block will be inserted with the correct function/property names. Provides the starting framework within which you can then edit things such as description. Works with JS, CoffeeScript and ES6.
Jade (Preprocessor Fork) 2.1.0 Add first class support for jade (including syntax highlighting). This fork features better highlighting for inline preprocessors.
EditedTwilight 1.0.1 You will love to use this theme if you have used it once. if you not belive this then try it.

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
AsciiDoc Preview 1.1.8 Live preview for AsciiDoc documents.
Orchid Theme 1.1.1 Orchid theme for Brackets
Name-a-project 0.0.6 Extension to enable personalized, per-project nicknames for projects.
OS X Style - Flat & Dark 1.0.2 Dark and flat style theme for Brackets. Created with color palette of iOS 7.
New Moon 1.1.1 New Moon Theme for Brackets. A beautiful, middle-contrast dark theme inspired by Twilight and Tomorrow Night Eighties. Truly a lovely sight to behold.
Smooth Neutrals 1.0.2 Modified Son of Hammsidian Theme. Support for wangling in the colors of Jeff Booher's Bookmarks Extension to better fit the Smooth Neutrals theme.
Brackets Synapse 1.2.0 Brackets extension for file sync between local and remote via FTP, Connect to server via SFTP protocol is now possible. Show Release Noto: https://github.com/kooohei/brackets-synapse/wiki
Tonight's Specials 1.0.2 A remake of 'Specials Board' theme included with Coda 2 for Brackets, based on the Specials Menu theme by Max Isom (http://electrichaircut.com)
Node Inspector 0.0.4 Extension to turn on/off node-inspector.

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/39
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/39.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 09/14/2015 to 09/21/2015.

Last week there were 5 new Extensions and 8 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

The Brackets team prepares for the upcoming 1.5 release. Last minute pull request need to be based on the release branch. If you have some spare time to provide localization for your language and/or review localization PR’s, this is highly appreciated.

If you are interested in supporting the team, feel free to review and comment on existing PR’s. If you found an issue, don’t hesitate to file it and if you already fixed one of the existing issues (you know what you need to do next ;-)).

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter
  • Slack Channel

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Beautify 5234 ⇔
2 Brackets Icons 5015 #3 ⇑
3 Emmet 4739 #2 ⇓
4 HTML Designer for Brackets 4341 ☼
5 Bootstrap Skeleton 1728 #11 ⇑
6 Brackets Git 1634 #5 ⇓
7 Indent Guides 1311 ☼
8 Autoprefixer 1295 #10 ⇑
9 PHP Syntax Hint 1283 ☼
10 Documents Toolbar 1263 #7 ⇓
11 Extensions Rating 1238 #4 ⇓

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Apyx easy Dark 1195 ☼
2 New One Dark 938 ☼
3 Tonight's Specials 764 ☼
4 Robcaa Dark Theme 704 #3 ⇓
5 Monokai Dark Soda 657 #4 ⇓
6 Mystique 648 #2 ⇓
7 Github/Gist Theme 624 #11 ⇑
8 Raven 473 #1 ⇓
9 Monokai 429 #7 ⇓
10 Blueprint 343 ⇔
11 OS X Style - Flat & Dark 316 #8 ⇓

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
C style comment button 1.0.1 Inspired by Dreamweaver's code editor. Allows you to apply/remove c-style comments to/from the currently selected text without touching your keyboard. C-style comments are the same / … / format that is used in c, c++, Objective-C, PHP, Java, JavaScript, C#, and CSS
Tonight's Specials 1.0.0 A remake of 'Specials Board' theme included with Coda 2 for Brackets, based on the Specials Menu theme by Max Isom (http://electrichaircut.com)
Apyx easy Dark 1.0.0 A dark, easy to read, relaxing theme.
Fortran Programming Language syntax highlighter 0.0.1 Brings support for Fortran Programming Language from CodeMirror to Brackets.
constrat-blue-theme 1.0.0 Constrat Blue Theme for Brackets

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Node.js bindings 1.4.1 Execute node scripts and common npm commands inside Brackets.
Swatcher 1.2.1 Generates CodeHints/Colorpalettes from importing via LESS/SASS Files, Images (Colorpicker) or Adobe Swatchfiles (.aco, .ase)
Zurb Foundation 5 Basic Template 1.1.0 Adds Zurb Foundation 5 basic template to your page. Go to menu and select File -> New Zurb Foundation 5 Document.
Ember.js templates (HTMLBars) Syntax Highlighter 1.0.1 Add syntax highlighting support for ember.js template language HTMLBars.
Neon Morning 1.1.0 Like Neon, but more upbeat and happy. Themed Code Folding and CSS Color Preview.
HTML Designer for Brackets 2.0.3 NOW WITH RESPONSIVE DESIGN TOOLS (BETA)! Design and customize web ui with HTML and CSS. Now with taggable Design snippet/bookmark support.
New One Dark 1.2.0 Inspired by the One Dark Theme from Atom Editor
HTML comment button 1.0.2 Inspired by Dreamweaver's code editor. Allows you to apply/remove HTML comments () to/from the currently selected text without touching your keyboard.

What’s going on?

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/37
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/37.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 08/31/2015 to 09/07/2015.

Last week there were 2 new Extensions and 10 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

I’m not late anymore! I wasa able to catch up with all the updates and here I am. Still too much things going on at the same time. This will probably never get any better. When it comes to this blog and the tweet bot, I have a couple of small improvements that I’m going to implement soon. So stay tuned.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter
  • Slack Channel

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
File Tree Exclude 0.6.3 Excludes folders from the Brackets file system to avoid the 30,000 file limit. This is an updated version of Glenn Ruehle's now defunkt plugin.
Valejo Theme 1.0.0 Valejo theme for brackets

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Quick Markup 3.3.0 Quick Markup allows fast HTML markup generation as you type similar to what how a rich text editor works. Tags and shortcuts are configurable. Multiple cursor support.
Preferences setup UI 1.4.0 Form for editing preferences.
Extensions Rating 0.7.3 Shows extension's download count(daily, overall, average and per version) and GitHub stats(stars and forks). Find most usable and popular extensions for Brackets via badges system! Sort extensions and find themes!
WakaTime 1.0.7 Automatic time tracking and analytics about your programming.
Brackets WordPress Functions Hints 1.0.2 Brackets WordPress Functions Hints - Provides code hints for function for the WordPress Themes and/or Plugins.
Brackets WordPress Hooks Hints 1.0.2 Brackets WordPress Hooks Hints - Provides code hints for hook for the WordPress Themes and/or Plugins.
Brackets Synapse 1.1.0 Brackets extension for file sync between local and remote via FTP, Connect to server via SFTP protocol is now possible.
Numbered Bookmarks 0.9.2 Bookmark lines in the editor (CTRL+SHIFT+1 … CTRL+SHIFT+9) as you work so you can quickly jump back to them later (CTRL+1 … CTRL+9). Delete all: CTRL+SHIFT+DELETE
Zombie theme 1.0.1 Dark zombie theme for Brackets
Brackets MySQL simple table show 0.0.11 A Brackets extension who show entries of MySQL tables

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/36
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/36.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 08/24/2015 to 08/31/2015.

Last week there were 2 new Extensions and 10 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

I’m late, late, late and still catching up with the previous weeks. Too much things going on at the same time. New projects and maintenance of old projects :-)

One important update: there is a new way to get in contact with the team. We have created a Slack Channel where you can ask questions about Brackets and talk about features.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter
  • Slack Channel

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

5 Minimap 1959 ☼
6 Open In Browser 1568 ☼

8 Brackets Synapse 1482 ☼
9 Autoprefixer 1246 #8 ⇓
10 Indent Guides 1233 ⇔
11 PHP Syntax Hint 1220 #9 ⇓

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Zombie theme 817 ☼
2 Monokai Dark Soda 644 #4 ⇑
3 Robcaa Dark Theme 559 ☼
4 Themes NewDay 541 ☼
5 Nemo 534 #1 ⇓
6 Ocean dark 434 #3 ⇓

8 Robcaa Light Theme 375 ☼
9 Monokai 375 #6 ⇓
10 New One Dark 335 #5 ⇓
11 OS X Style - Flat & Dark 286 #8 ⇓

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Brackets Detect Indentation 0.1.0 Detects the indentation used in the current document and sets the editor settings accordingly.
darkron 1.0.0 This theme is for dark theme lovers

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
LESS AutoCompile 1.1.10 Automatically compiles less files upon saving.
Brackets Bower 0.2.13 Manage your application's front-end dependencies using Bower. You can install and prune dependencies using the bower.json file and configure Bower through .bowerrc. Also, quickly install front-end packages by hitting Ctrl/Cmd-Alt-B, then start typing the name of a package. Once you see the package you want, hit Enter and the package will be installed into your project folder. NOTE: To install some packages, you must have Git installed.
Open In Browser 4.0.9 Open the contents of your current view/tab in a web browser.
Brackets Print Margin 0.3.2 Adds a print margin line to the editor to helpt you keep your lines of code below a certain length. Easy configuration in the status bar.
Minimap 3.2.5 The minimap shows a smaller version of your code at the right of the screen. It can be used to quickly scroll to a certain part of your file. This is a fork of brackets-wdminimap by Brian Adams (https://github.com/websiteduck/brackets-wdminimap)
LÖVE Hints for Brackets.io 1.1.0 Provides LÖVE2D code hints!
ExportPDF 1.0.3 Export a file or a selection to PDF.
adenin Mobility Portal Builder 0.1.2 Provides mobile device previews and code hints for Polymer and Tangere components
ES6 to ES5 AutoCompile (babeljs) 1.0.1 Automatically compiles ES6 code to ES5 upon saving.
ECT Syntax Highlight 1.1.1 Add syntax highlighting support for the ECT Template Engine (http://ectjs.com/), backward compatible with ECO

The best part of it is that if you want to write some words again and again, just go to Help > Show Extensions Folder. Once folder opens up, open folder user > brackets-php-syntax-hint. There you will get php-syntax.txt, open that file and go on adding syntax and words you require and reload Brackets to enjoy writing codes(words you have added). Name Version Description Download

Autosave Files on Window Blur 1.0.6 Autosave all open files when switching applications, in the style of PHPStorm/WebStorm.

NOTE: v2.0.0 changed the hotkey for compatibility with Brackets 1.3.
